TopicTitle: Kerbals couldn't grab or board after landing on the mun

Articles.Content: I landed on the mun got all my kerbals out and placed a flag, went to go put them back in the lander but they could not grab the ladders. The key popup appeared but they would not perform the action. Their RCS packs worked but nothing else.
I also experienced this.  Was remediated by closing out and relaunching game.
Thread moved from KSP 2 Discussion to KSP 2 Bug Reports.
Same, quitting to main menu and reloading cleared it.
